T04TD3947E:238a-1: bo dhi p'a tha pra d'i pam /
T04TD3947E:238a-3: byang chub lam gyi sgron ma /
T04TD3947E:238a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3947E:238a-5: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad dag dang de'i chos dang //
T04TD3947E:238a-6: dge 'dun rnams la gus pa chen pos phyag byas te //
T04TD3947E:238a-7: slob ma bzang po byang chub 'od kyis bskul gyur pas //
T04TD3947E:238a-8: byang chub lam gyi sgron ma rab tu gsal bar bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-0: chung ngu @238b 'bring dang mchog gyur pas //
T04TD3947E:238b-1: skyes bu gsum du shes par bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-2: de dag mtshan nyid rab gsal ba //
T04TD3947E:238b-3: so so'i dbye ba bri bar bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-4: gang zhig thabs ni gang dag gis //
T04TD3947E:238b-5: 'khor ba'i bde ba tsam dag la //
T04TD3947E:238b-6: rang nyid don du gnyer byed pa //
T04TD3947E:238b-7: de ni skyes bu tha mar shes //
T04TD3947E:238b-8: srid pa'i bde la rgyab phyogs shing //
T04TD3947E:238b-9: sdig pa'i las las ldog bdag nyid //
T04TD3947E:238b-10: gang zhig rang zhi tsam don gnyer //
T04TD3947E:238b-11: skyes bu de ni 'bring zhes bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-12: rang rgyud gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis //
T04TD3947E:238b-13: gang zhig gzhan gyi sdug bsngal kun //
T04TD3947E:238b-14: yang dag zad par kun nas 'dod //
T04TD3947E:238b-15: skyes bu de ni mchog yin no ;
T04TD3947E:238b-16: / sems can dam ba byang chub mchog /'dod par gyur ba de dag la //
T04TD3947E:238b-17: bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa yi //
T04TD3947E:238b-18: yang dag thabs ni bshad par bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-19: rdzogs sangs bris sku la sogs dang //
T04TD3947E:238b-20: mchod rten dam pa mngon phyogs nas //
T04TD3947E:238b-21: me tog bdug spos dngos po dag / ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-22: kun bzang spyod las gsungs pa yi //
T04TD3947E:238b-23: mchod pa rnam pa bdun dag kyang //
T04TD3947E:238b-24: byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par //
T04TD3947E:238b-25: mi ldog pa yi sems dag gis //
T04TD3947E:238b-26: dkon mchog gsum la rab dad cing //
T04TD3947E:238b-27: pus mo lha nga sar btsugs nas //
T04TD3947E:238b-28: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T04TD3947E:238b-29: dang por skyabs 'gro lan gsum bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-30: de nas sems can thams cad la //
T04TD3947E:238b-31: byams pa'i sems ni sngon 'gro bas //
T04TD3947E:238b-32: ngan song gsum du skye sogs dang //
T04TD3947E:238b-34: 'gro ba sa lus la bltas te //
T04TD3947E:238b-35: sdug bsngal gyis ni sdug bsngal ba //
T04TD3947E:238b-36: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rgyu mtshan las //
T04TD3947E:238b-38: ldog pa med par dam 'cha' ba'i //
T04TD3947E:238b-39: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-40: de ltar smon pa'i sems dag ni //
T04TD3947E:238b-41: bskyed pa'i yon tan gang yin pa //
T04TD3947E:238b-42: de ni sdong po bkod pa yi //
T04TD3947E:238b-43: mdo las byams pas rab tu bshad//
T04TD3947E:238b-44: de yi mdo klog pa'am bla ma la mnyan te //
T04TD3947E:238b-45: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtha' med pa //
T04TD3947E:238b-46: rnam par shes par byas la de nas rgyu mtshan du //
T04TD3947E:238b-47: de ltar yang dang yang du sems ni bskyed par bya //
T04TD3947E:238b-48: dpa' sbyin gyis zhus mdo dag las //
T04TD3947E:238b-49: 'di yi bsod nams rab bstan pa //
T04TD3947E:239a-0: @239a * // gang de tshigs bcad gsum tsam du //
T04TD3947E:239a-1: mdor bsdus 'dir ni bri par bya //
T04TD3947E:239a-2: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //
T04TD3947E:239a-3: de la gal te gzugs mchis na //
T04TD3947E:239a-4: nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste //
T04TD3947E:239a-5: de ni de bas ltag par 'gyur //
T04TD3947E:239a-6: gang g'a'i bye ba grangs snyed kyi //
T04TD3947E:239a-7: sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis //
T04TD3947E:239a-8: rin chen dag gis kun bkang ste //
T04TD3947E:239a-9: 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas //
T04TD3947E:239a-10: gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te //
T04TD3947E:239a-11: byang chub tu ni sems btud na //
T04TD3947E:239a-13: de la mtha' ni ma mchis so //
T04TD3947E:239a-14: byang chub smon pa'i sems dag bskyed nas ni //
T04TD3947E:239a-15: 'bad pa mang pos kun du spel bya zhing //
T04TD3947E:239a-16: 'di ni skye ba gzhan du'ang dran don du //
T04TD3947E:239a-17: ji skad bshad pa'i bslang ba'ang yongs su bsrung //
T04TD3947E:239a-18: 'jug sems bdag nyid sdom pa ma gtogs par //
T04TD3947E:239a-19: yang dag smon pa 'phel bar 'gyur ma yin //
T04TD3947E:239a-20: rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon pa 'phel 'dod pas //
T04TD3947E:239a-21: de phyir 'bad pas 'di ni nges par blang //
T04TD3947E:239a-22: so sor thar pa rigs bdun gyi //
T04TD3947E:239a-23: rtag tu sdom gzhan ldan pa dang //
T04TD3947E:239a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi //
T04TD3947E:239a-25: skal pa yod kyi gzhan du min //
T04TD3947E:239a-26: so sor thar pa ris bdun dang //
T04TD3947E:239a-27: de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa la //
T04TD3947E:239a-28: tshangs spyod dpal ni mchog yin te //
T04TD3947E:239a-29: dge slong sdom pa dag tu bzhed //
T04TD3947E:239a-30: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dag gi / tshul khrims legs gsungs cho ga yis //
T04TD3947E:239a-31: yang dag mtshan nyid ldan pa yi //
T04TD3947E:239a-32: bla ma bzang las sdom pa blang //
T04TD3947E:239a-33: sdom pa'i chog la ma las dang //
T04TD3947E:239a-34: bdag nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas //
T04TD3947E:239a-35: sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan //
T04TD3947E:239a-36: bla ma bzang por shes par bya //
T04TD3947E:239a-38: gal te bla ma ma rnyed na //
T04TD3947E:239a-39: de las gzhan sdom nod pa yi //
T04TD3947E:239a-40: cho ga yang dag bshad par bya //
T04TD3947E:239a-41: de la sngon tshe 'jam pa'i dpal //
T04TD3947E:239a-42: aa ba r'a dzar gyur pa yis ;
T04TD3947E:239a-43: / ji ltar byang chub thugs bskyed pa //
T04TD3947E:239a-44: 'jam dpal gyi ni sangs rgyas zhing //
T04TD3947E:239a-45: rgyan gyi mdo las bshad pa ltar //
T04TD3947E:239a-46: de bzhin 'dir ni rab gsal bri //
T04TD3947E:239a-47: mgon po rnams kyi spyan snga ru //
T04TD3947E:239a-48: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing //
T04TD3947E:239a-49: 'gro ba thams cad mgron du gnyer //
T04TD3947E:239b-0: de @239b dag 'khor ba las bsgral lo //
T04TD3947E:239b-1: gnod sems khro ba'i sems nyid dang //
T04TD3947E:239b-2: ser sna dang ni phrag dog nyid //
T04TD3947E:239b-3: deng nas bzung nas byang chub mchog / thob kyi bar du mi bya'o //
T04TD3947E:239b-4: tshangs par spyod pa spyad bya zhing //
T04TD3947E:239b-5: sdig dang 'dod pa spang bar bya //
T04TD3947E:239b-6: tshul khrims sdom pa la dga' bas //
T04TD3947E:239b-7: sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya //
T04TD3947E:239b-8: bdag nyid myur ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T04TD3947E:239b-9: byang chub thob par mi spro zhing //
T04TD3947E:239b-10: sems can gcig gi rgyu yis ni ;
T04TD3947E:239b-11: / phyi ma'i mu mthar gnas par bgyi //
T04TD3947E:239b-12: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
T04TD3947E:239b-13: zhing dag rnam par sbyang bar bya //
T04TD3947E:239b-14: ming nas gzung ba byas pa dang ;
T04TD3947E:239b-15: / phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par gnas //
T04TD3947E:239b-16: bdag gi lus dang ngag gi las //
T04TD3947E:239b-17: thams cad du ni dag par byas //
T04TD3947E:239b-18: yid kyi las kyang dag bya ste //
T04TD3947E:239b-19: mi dge'i las rnams mi bya'o //
T04TD3947E:239b-20: rang gi lus ngag sems ni rnam dag rgyu //
T04TD3947E:239b-21: 'jug pa'i sems kyi bdag nyid sdom gnas pa//
T04TD3947E:239b-22: tshul khrims bslab pa gsum la legs bslabs pas //
T04TD3947E:239b-23: tshul khrims bslab pa gsum la gus cher 'gyur //
T04TD3947E:239b-24: de bas rnam dag rdzogs byang chub //
T04TD3947E:239b-25: sems dpa'i sdom pa'i sdom dag ni //
T04TD3947E:239b-26: 'bad par byas pas rdzogs byang chub //
T04TD3947E:239b-27: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
T04TD3947E:239b-28: bsod nams ye shes rang bzhin gyi //
T04TD3947E:239b-29: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
T04TD3947E:239b-30: rgyu ni sangs rgyas thams cad dag / mngon shes skyed pa nyid du bzhed //
T04TD3947E:239b-31: ji ltar 'dab gshog ma skyes pa'i //
T04TD3947E:239b-32: bya ni mkha' la 'phur mi nus //
T04TD3947E:239b-33: de bzhin mngon shes stobs bral bas //
T04TD3947E:239b-34: sems can don byed nus pa min //
T04TD3947E:239b-35: mngon shes ldan pa'i nyin mtshan gyi //
T04TD3947E:239b-36: bsod nams dag ni gang yin te //
T04TD3947E:239b-37: mngon shes dag dang bral gyur la //
T04TD3947E:239b-38: skye ba brgyar yang yod ma yin //
T04TD3947E:239b-39: myur du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs //
T04TD3947E:239b-40: yongs su rdzogs par 'dod gyur pa //
T04TD3947E:239b-41: des ni 'bad byas mngon shes dag /'grub par 'gyur gyi le los min //
T04TD3947E:239b-42: zhi gnas grub pa ma yin pas //
T04TD3947E:239b-44: de phyir zhi gnas bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T04TD3947E:239b-45: yang dang yang du 'bad par bya //
T04TD3947E:239b-46: zhi gnas yan lag rnam nyams pas //
T04TD3947E:239b-47: rab tu 'bad de bsgoms byas kyang //
T04TD3947E:240a-3: de phyir ting 'dzin tshogs le'u las //
T04TD3947E:240a-4: gsungs pa'i yan lag la legs gnas //
T04TD3947E:240a-5: dmigs pa gang rung gcig la yang //
T04TD3947E:240a-6: yid ni dge la gzhag par bya //
T04TD3947E:240a-7: rnal 'byor zhi gnas grub gyur na ;
T04TD3947E:240a-9: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor dang //
T04TD3947E:240a-10: bral bas sgrib pa zad mi 'gyur //
T04TD3947E:240a-11: de phyir nyon mongs shes bya yi //
T04TD3947E:240a-12: sgrib pa ma lus spang ba'i phyir //
T04TD3947E:240a-13: shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor //
T04TD3947E:240a-14: rtag tu thabs bcas bsgom par bya //
T04TD3947E:240a-15: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab dang //
T04TD3947E:240a-16: shes rab bral ba'i thabs dag kyang //
T04TD3947E:240a-17: gang phyir 'ching ba zhes gsungs pa //
T04TD3947E:240a-18: de phyir gnyis ka spang mi bya //
T04TD3947E:240a-19: shes rab gang dang thabs gang zhes //
T04TD3947E:240a-20: the tshom dag ni spang bya'i phyir //
T04TD3947E:240a-21: thabs rnams dang ni shes rab kyi //
T04TD3947E:240a-22: yang dag dbye ba gsal bar bya //
T04TD3947E:240a-23: shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i //
T04TD3947E:240a-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs //
T04TD3947E:240a-25: dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad dag / rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs su bshad //
T04TD3947E:240a-26: thabs bsgoms dbang gis bdag nyid kyis //
T04TD3947E:240a-27: gang zhig shes rab rnam bsgom pa //
T04TD3947E:240a-28: de ni byang chub myur du thob //
T04TD3947E:240a-29: bdag med gcig pu bsgoms pas min //
T04TD3947E:240a-30: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
T04TD3947E:240a-31: skye ba med par rtogs gyur pa'i //
T04TD3947E:240a-32: rang bzhin stong nyid shes pa ni //
T04TD3947E:240a-33: shes rab ces ni yongs su bshad //
T04TD3947E:240a-34: yod pa skye ba rigs min te //
T04TD3947E:240a-35: med pa'ang nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
T04TD3947E:240a-36: nyes pa gnyis kar thal 'gyur phyir //
T04TD3947E:240a-37: gnyis ka dag kyang 'byung ba min //
T04TD3947E:240a-38: dngos po rang las mi skye zhing //
T04TD3947E:240a-39: gzhan dang gnyis ka las kyang min //
T04TD3947E:240a-40: rgyu med las min de yi phyir //
T04TD3947E:240a-41: ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med //
T04TD3947E:240a-42: yang na chos rnams thams cad dag / gcig dang du mas rnam dpyad na //
T04TD3947E:240a-43: ngo bo nyid ni mi dmigs pas //
T04TD3947E:240a-44: rang bzhin med pa nyid du nges //
T04TD3947E:240a-45: stong nyid bdun cu'i rigs pa dang //
T04TD3947E:240a-46: dbu ma rtsa ba sogs las kyang //
T04TD3947E:240a-47: dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi //
T04TD3947E:240a-48: stong pa nyid ni grub bshad pa //
T04TD3947E:240a-49: gang phyir gzhung ni mngas 'gyur bas //
T04TD3947E:240a-50: de phyir 'dir ni ma spros la //
T04TD3947E:240b-0: grub pa'i grub mtha' @240b tsam zhig tu //
T04TD3947E:240b-1: bsgom pa'i phyir ni rab tu bshad //
T04TD3947E:240b-2: de bas chos rnams ma lus pa'i //
T04TD3947E:240b-3: rang bzhin dag ni mi dmigs pas //
T04TD3947E:240b-4: bdag med par ni bsgom gang yin //
T04TD3947E:240b-5: de nyid shes rab bsgom pa yin //
T04TD3947E:240b-6: shes rab kyis ni chos rnams kun //
T04TD3947E:240b-7: gang gi rang bzhin ma mthong zhing //
T04TD3947E:240b-8: shes rab de nyid rig bshad pa //
T04TD3947E:240b-9: rnam rtog med par de bsgom bya //
T04TD3947E:240b-10: rnam rtog las byung srid pa 'di //
T04TD3947E:240b-11: rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid de //
T04TD3947E:240b-12: de phyir ma lus rtogs spangs pa //
T04TD3947E:240b-13: mya ngan 'das pa mchog yin no //
T04TD3947E:240b-14: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T04TD3947E:240b-15: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
T04TD3947E:240b-16: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung bar byed //
T04TD3947E:240b-17: rtog med ting 'dzin la gnas pa //
T04TD3947E:240b-18: nam mkha' bzhin du rtog med gsal //
T04TD3947E:240b-20: rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs las kyang /
T04TD3947E:240b-21: dam chos 'di la rgyal ba'i sras //
T04TD3947E:240b-22: rnam par mi rtog bsams gyur na //
T04TD3947E:240b-23: rnam rtog bgrod dka' rnams 'das te //
T04TD3947E:240b-24: rim gyis mi rtog thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3947E:240b-26: lung dang rigs pa dag gis ni //
T04TD3947E:240b-27: chos rnams thams cad skye med pa'i //
T04TD3947E:240b-28: rang bzhin med pa nges byas nas //
T04TD3947E:240b-29: rnam par rtog med bsgom par bya //
T04TD3947E:240b-30: de ltar de nyid bsgom byas nas //
T04TD3947E:240b-31: rim gyis drod sogs thob byas nas //
T04TD3947E:240b-32: rab dga' la sogs thob 'gyur te //
T04TD3947E:240b-33: sangs rgyas byang chub yun mi ring //
T04TD3947E:240b-34: sngags mthu nyid las grub pa yi //
T04TD3947E:240b-35: zhi dang rgyas sogs las rnams kyis //
T04TD3947E:240b-36: bum pa bzang grub la sogs pa //
T04TD3947E:240b-37: grub chen brgyad sogs stobs kyis kyang //
T04TD3947E:240b-38: bde ba yis ni byang chub tshogs //
T04TD3947E:240b-39: yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang //
T04TD3947E:240b-40: bya ba spyod sogs rgyud gsungs pa'i //
T04TD3947E:240b-41: gal te gsang sngags spyod 'dod na //
T04TD3947E:240b-42: de tshe slob dpon dbang bskur phyir //
T04TD3947E:240b-43: bsnyen bkur rin chen sogs sbyin dang //
T04TD3947E:240b-44: dka' sgrub la sogs thams cad kyis //
T04TD3947E:240b-45: bla ma dam pa mnyes par bya //
T04TD3947E:240b-46: bla ma mnyes par gyur pa yis //
T04TD3947E:240b-47: yongs rdzogs slob dpon dbang bskur bas //
T04TD3947E:240b-48: sdig kun rnam dag bdag nyid ni //
T04TD3947E:240b-49: dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur //
T04TD3947E:240b-50: dang po sangs rgyas rgyud chen las //
T04TD3947E:240b-51: rab tu 'bad pas bkag pa'i phyir //
T04TD3947E:241a-2: tshangs par spyod pas blang mi bya //
T04TD3947E:241a-3: gal te dbang bskur de 'dzin na //
T04TD3947E:241a-4: tshangs spyod dka' thub la gnas pas //
T04TD3947E:241a-5: bkag pa spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T04TD3947E:241a-6: dka' thub sdom pa de nyams te //
T04TD3947E:241a-7: brtul zhugs can de pham pa yi //
T04TD3947E:241a-9: de ni ngan song nges lhung bas //
T04TD3947E:241a-10: grub pa yang ni yod ma yin //
T04TD3947E:241a-11: rgyud kun nyan dang 'chad pa dang //
T04TD3947E:241a-12: sbyin sreg mchod sbyin sogs byed pa //
T04TD3947E:241a-13: slob dpon dbang bskur rnyed 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3947E:241a-14: de nyid rig la nyes pa med //
T04TD3947E:241a-15: gnas brtan mar me mdzad dpal gyis ;
T04TD3947E:241a-16: / mdo sogs chos las bshad mthong ba //
T04TD3947E:241a-17: byang chub 'od kyis gsol btab nas //
T04TD3947E:241a-18: byang chub lam bshad mdor bsdus byas //
T04TD3947E:241a-19: byang chub lam gyi sgron ma slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3947E:241a-21: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang /
T04TD3947E:241a-22: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa /
T04TD3947E:241a-23: chos 'di ni zhang zhung gi tho ling gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa'o//
